description:
Saber is coming to work with me to help take on the straight boys.
We did this solo to kind of ease him in to the camera stuff - get him used to all the lights and cameras on him. Though he's always wanted to do gay porn, he was nervous as could be. But it sure didn't stop him from firing up his big 'ole uncut dick! I swear..where do these young uns get 'em from?!
And boy was he turned on by doing the video. We actually had a misfire on this video. He was showing off his ass too me, so I had my camera firmly planted on his boottie hole, then ~irk~ he busted a nut. Not even worth it as an outtake as not a single camera caught it. He was a bit horrified as he really wanted to come work with the hot guys on the site and he was worried it would ruin his chances.
He assured me he could bust again, and in no time flat he fired up his dick, busting a second nut (and a respectable one at that!). I was like, "You're hired!"
Ahhh youth! Look for Saber in action this Friday!
title: Saber - Solo
